Interface BufferedPlotListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
aggregate
public interface BufferedPlotListener

A BufferedPlotListener responds to events from an instance of BufferedPlot.

Method Summary
 void plot_resized(BufferedPlot plot, java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          The BufferedPlot has new dimensions.
 void render_to_plot(BufferedPlot plot, java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          The BufferedPlot is preparing to render on-screen and needs the clients to render to the off-screen surface.

                         java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
The BufferedPlot has new dimensions.
Parameters:

render_to_plot

public void render_to_plot(BufferedPlot plot,
                           java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
The BufferedPlot is preparing to render on-screen and needs the clients to render to the off-screen surface.
Parameters:
plot - the BufferedPlot that is about to display
g2 - the off-screen drawing surface to render to
